Name: Udjat-eyes
Description: The udjat-eye depicts an open human eye to which some extra elements have been added. The amulet is connected with the celestial deity in the shape of a falcon and therefore also with the king. It is one of the most popular amulets and was not just used in the funerary cult.These udjat-eyes made of green faience have low relief on both sides. The pupils and edges of the eye are painted black.
